name: Black Diamond ATC Guide Belay Device
description: A versatile belay/rappel device with a guide-mode for bringing up 1 or 2 seconds. Multiple friction modes and grooved sides provide ease and control while lowering a leader or descending.Hot forged aluminum body for strength with machined windows to keep it light.Oval anchor-hole feeds rope easily when in guide mode.Beefy cable holds its shape and resists getting caught up in the device.Recommended for use with 8.1 to 11mm diameter ropes.
